kpi.name: M8014C3

kpi_info.title: Failed Inter eNB Handover preparations due to target eNB admission control
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Inter-eNB X2-based Handover preparations due to the target eNB's admission control reasons. UPDATED: The reception of an X2AP: Handover Preparation Failure message from the target eNB.

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed Inter eNB Handover preparations due to target eNB admission control
